title: Practical Application Course in Online Qualitative Research Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic research methodology and practical experience in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Enhancing qualitative research competencies for solving practical science-related problems in corporate settings through smartphone-based VR/simulation tools

learning_goals: Learners can explain qualitative research design processes in online environments based on the TPACK framework
Learners can create and execute interview guides for solving field problems in science using VR simulations
Learners can revise drafts of qualitative data analysis reports by incorporating peer feedback on online discussion platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
